name: Peach Sangria
ingredients: white wine, peach pure and brandy or peach schnapps, orange juice or triple sec, seltzer or sprite, peach, orange, apple, green grapes
instructions: add ingredients in the pitcher depending on the strength or sweetness of your liking

name: Strawberry Mojito
ingredients: lemon rum, triple sec, lemon or lime juice, mint, lime, strawberries, sprite or seltzer and sugar
instructions: mash mint, lime wedges, strawberries and sugar if using seltzer, add 1 oz of lime or lemon juice, rum and top off with soda
